title: Neuronic
content:
Here's a new font I've been working on. It's based very loosely on a font I saw in Bladerunner - the "POLICE" logo that was on the side of the police "flying-car."   
   
 ![neuronic](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415090258im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/29/709.gif)
author: bardram

comments.content:
Here is a shot of the original...its not the photo I based it on, but you get the picture...   
   
 ![spinner](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415090258im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/29/710.jpg)

Pretty cool - the chunky irregularity is killer (pardon the pun).   
   
hhp
Is nice but try with other "T", cause actually it seems like a seven.
